title: Should I talk about my experience of overcoming mental illness in my college admissions essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: Only if you have Truly overcome your mental illness, and that the mandatory letter of recommendation that is submitted by your guidance counselor (as a cover letter for your transcript) which will describe you over a several year period as both a student and as a whole Person, supports what you will state, especially about Overcoming the issue. Make certain that you have a Long polite discussion with your guidance counselor.

Being that in most cultures and situations you really don’t know how people who would read your essay would react I’d offer that this be something you would decide to talk about, if its appropriate and necessary to the situation, with the people of your choosing. Its also of potential value to decideif you’d want this information in this sort of record , again as people who would access it might not look at this information in the same way you do or would intend.
